favourite.article: I love this song pls can someone send me the name of the writer of this song so I can get more of his songs.

When I'm with the author of this song. I thank the Lord that He chose a brother who love the Lord so much. He just humble himself and keep serving the Lord. Although he has 3 children, he should take care of his family, he still put Christ and the church in the first place. May the Lord bless his service and his family.

I give You the FIRST PLACE in everything I do Lord. Have preeminence in me, make me one that is absolute for You. I consecrate my morning times to You Lord, to love You with all my heart. My prayer is Lord, infuse me with Yourself, every day for the rest of my life. Make me a useful vessel in Your hand to turn this age. I will choose to be an overcomer! Just a simple, crazy lover of Jesus, loving You with my whole being. I can't wait to finally meet You Lord Jesus Meanwhile, I will continue to love You with the best love.
Amen!
Lord, we give You the first place!
I love this song ...
LOVING YOU LORD is the meaning of my life, without You life is emptiness and vanity...
We should be like Mary, who love the Lord and who kept nothing in reserve for herself. LOVING THE LORD MAKES US A PROPER PERSON!!!

We should not leave our first love to the Lord because that is our testimony as He is our Bridegroom. Leaving the first love toward the Lord is the beginning of the churches' degradation (in the 7 churches—the church in Ephesus). WE MUST GIVE TO HIM OUR BEST LOVE, OUR FIRST LOVE, AMEN.
Oh, Lord Jesus, You are indeed our first love! Lord refresh our enjoyment with You that we may love You more. Oh Lord Jesus our dear husband! Keep us in Your wonderful love! Amen!
Amen! I miss You Lord. Anybody can send me a piano instrumental, I need to offer with my voice in our church. Thanks.

There comes a time when the Lord will expose our heart and we can only say, "Forgive me if I've left my first love." I thank the Lord for being faithful. This hymn reminded me that the Lord has the right to take all that I love other than Him to replace them with Himself. We need to learn to declare "Do not give all that I want." May we love the Lord with such preeminence. Lord, continue to draw us!
Oh Lord, have preeminence in me. I'll give and love You with the best love. <3
O Lord Jesus, I love You with the deepest part of my being. I'm giving You my first love.
Lord I love You, I love You today more than I did yesterday, You are truly the Most Charming One! O, this sweet, Eternal, Divine Romance.
Lord show Your love that I might be constrain by Your love. Lord infuse me with Yourself abundantly. Lord Jesus I love You with my best love.
Lord I still love You.
Take me dear Lord, I'll love You with the best Love.
Lord, I still love You...
Lord, forgive me if I've left my first love.
Oh Lord I consecrate my spirit, soul and body, to be saturated with Your word through listening to hymns and Life-study that You may occupy every part of my being, Amen.
Oh Lord Jesus, cause me dear Lord to consecrate my whole being unto You so that I could love You, dear Lord Jesus.

Amen! How we need to give our best love to the Lord. He must be the first place in all things. Let nothing replace His place in our hearts. Everyday, how we need to tell the Lord "I LOVE YOU LORD AND INFUSE US WITH YOUR VERY SELF".
O Lord Jesus, for now Lord I cannot say that I can give You my best love but please Lord help me to infuse Yourself to me abundantly...And let nothing take Your place in all my heart Lord.

Oh Lord my God, have mercy on me, forgive me. This wretched miserable sinner that I am, needs You more than can be spoken. I love who You are, what You are, I love You, forever I will love You. Take me from me, and keep me for You. I want only You. Only You, forever. My Love, my Life, my Hope, my Joy, You are so Holy. How Holy Holy Holy and precious and sacred is the name of Jesus. Sweet Lover, I hunger for You, I thirst for You, make me new. Make me for You. Give to me all of You. I want to marry You. I do my Love, I want so much to marry You. Live in me. I drink Your blood, I eat Your body, let me be crucified with You. Let me know Your suffering. Let me share my life for You. Let me give my life for You. I want only only only You. My Light, Life, Sunset, Sunrise, You are my Heaven, put Your arms around me, o Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God, make me a lamb of God, Daddy thank You for your Son, for Your sweet Holy Spirit, Daddy, Daddy I love You, I love You, I love You. The Sinner, David.
Lord Jesus, right now, more than ever, I love You. No matter what happens to me, I will always love You.
Please, care my heart always true to You, Lord. You are my best Friend, Love, Everything. Lord, I love You with all my heart.

I heard this Hymn for the First time in Delft, Netherland. I had just moved into the city for my studies and during one of the Home meetings...a sister called for us to sing the Song...Oh...it was marvelous to pour our Love...our Best Love to the Lord! Lord, I give you the First Place in all things by Faith...let NOTHING take your place in my Heart...Till we meet dear Lord, I would Love you with the Best Love!!!
I love You Lord. Please keep my heart always true to You Lord.
Lord Jesus cause me to give my first and best love to You, til we meet my dear Lord.
Infuse me more, more and more with Yourself, my Lord.
Lord, I love You.
Oh, infuse me LORD.

This song really touched and refreshed my love toward the Lord. What more can I say? He's everything that I have yet He is more than everything. In this world, I am just nothing...I'm just like a drop of water from the bucket and like a speck of dust blown by the wind-nothing. But in God's eyes, I'm valuable. Only in Him my life is meaningful and in Him my life has hope. Many times I didn't give Him the first place and I strongly testifies that during those time I have no peace and no satisfaction. I'm thankful that He is a speaking God, He is never tired of speaking to us and reminding us of this and that. May nothing take His place in my heart. Amen. 'till we meet dear Lord I love you with my best love.

Wow, praise You Lord that someone can actually write this. Lord, You are with me, so close, You are my Husband. I just love to spend time with You. I may not match You but I am being brought to match You, to look like You. You have exposed me and I realize, loving You, Lord is all I'm living for. Forgive me if at any time I may have left You, dear first and best love.

Many saints say that they love the Lord. It is good but this is not enough! We must give our best love for Him for He deserves our best love. We need to take Him and experience Him daily and moment by moment. Lord, we love You. Capture our heart to love only You!

I am so touched by this hymn and the comments. There are so many saints all over the world that had been captured by this beloved Bridegroom. Praise the Lord! I'm not alone. I'm in the Body loving the Lord with all the saints all over the world. The Lord deserve our best love and ONLY He is worthy for me to give my all to Him.. LORD JESUS, I JUST LOVE YOU ^^
Lord, You are what I need. Don't give me what I want, but infuse me with Yourself abudantly till we meet, dear Lord.

Oh Lord, give Yourself abundantly till we meet, dear Lord, for me to give You the first place in all things by faith in my work, my life, my service, my relationships. You must be my first, dear Lord. Amen.

O LORD JESUS, WE LOVE YOU LORD ABOVE ALL THINGS! Praise the Lord that this song reminds us that we are the loving seekers of God! We should Love Him In all Things by faith! There is no other way is so prevailing unless we love Him!

AC from Canada wrote a comment that truly touches the feeling that spontaneously wells in me with this beautiful, heart-recovering hymn. We may be in a personal "Laodicea", wretched and naked and blind, and be numb to the slightest realization of it. What a gracious gift it is to receive that poignant light which causes our sad heart to repent, to turn to the One in whose light-beams we find the grace of His love, tenderly touching the blind eyes and in our new found vision of WHO He really is and who we really are, we might embrace Him as our covering and kiss Him tenderly, washing His feet with our tears.

This song has helped me through some of the darkest times in my life. There is no problem with the Lord's love toward us. His love is knowledge surpassing. The problem is with our love toward Him. Like the church in Ephesus, losing our first love will result in degradation. Once we realize this, we must repent. Light will bring in more of the abundant supply of life, which will enable us to love our dear Lord Jesus again.

This song really touch me cause even though how sinful we are but still the Lord gives us the way to turn to Him. So bothers and sisters we need to turn to Him. Lord forgive me if I've left my first love. Lord brings us to the reality to love You as the first place in all things.

Amen. We should love the Lord to the uttermost. Give to Him the first place in all things. Oh Lord, how we love You. We want to give our best love to You.
This song really touches my heart, reminds me that our life is worth living for if we will give our best love to the Lord, and nothing can compare to His love for us.
Amen!! How we need to love the Lord with our first and best love.
This song really touches my heart, because my best love for the Lord is forever!

This song can renew our love to the Lord Jesus. The Lord deserves the preeminence in our life. He must be our first and last love. Truly this will be the hymn that in the day of my marriage with my wife. What can I say but HALLELUJAH!!!!!!! Praise the Lord, brothers and sisters. Lets all wait for the Lord by giving our first love to Him. Amen.

I was looking for a song "Lord, forgive me" to ask Lord for everything I do and turn to my spirit... This was the first song that came up and I was so touched that it does not matter what I did or do... as much as that I've left my first love... Lord, forgive me that I've left my first love. I give you the first place in all things by faith. Draw me Lord. Amen.

Everything is sure to pass away, Everyone is going their own way. But I still have You and You have me too, Loving one another's sweet.
Thank You, Lord. I love You.
Oh Lord I love You so much. You're my life and expression to be a God-man in life. I love You, Lord Jesus.
Lord Jesus I still love You. Jesus Lord You're my best love.
Lord, thank You for loving us... I love You, Lord with my best love...

My love toward the Lord is not strong enough but I still prayed that the Lord will give me a heart that will love Him thoroughly and will give Him my whole heart. this is the first problem of the church in Ephesus in Revelation 2:1-5 after that the church united with the world because of not giving their first love to the Lord but the Lord says repent to repent is not only to say all our sins to the Lord but rather this is a first step to turn to the Lord. We need to pray the the Lord will attract us more with His beauty. Amen.

Upon hearing this song, I felt something that suddenly opened my heart..it's GOD who really deserves our first and best love... He tend to take all things that we have but He replace it with Himself much more..
Though everything is sure to pass away and everyone is going their own way, we should not be afraid because we have the LORD..
Amen, my best love is only for the Lord, He is the beloved Bridegroom. Hallelujah!

The spirit in this song and in His Body has touched me to return to Him, to love Him, not anyone else, not anything, any matter and especially not any service. He has been covenanted to us in His blood. How we love Him and share Him!
'Tis so sweet to love the LORD with all of your Best LOVE. Saints, this LOVE for the LORD.....should be our LIVING.......
All I can say is "Oh LORD JESUS" You are the best love that I ever have.
We should love the Lord without any reservation in our being.
The Lord is my only real enjoyment and everything to me. There's nothing else that I need to love besides Him. I'll love You, Lord with my first and best love!

We love the Lord because within us there is an inward motivation. He first loved us and gave everything to us. This constrains us to love Him in return and give everything back to Him. Day by day as we enjoy the Lord, He is showing us His preciousness and that makes us realize how we need to love Him more. Our first love is our best love for the Lord, loving Him above all is the wisest decision we can make in our life. In our service, His love for us and our love for Him motivate us to go on. May we not leave our first love for the Lord, for He deserves the BEST love.
*cries*

I like this song because it reminds me of what I am living for. Oh Lord Jesus I love You. It reminds me of why I was created, to contain and love such a wonderful Person. To give Him my best love no matter what or who nothing should I love more than Him. Not even my services.
Jesus...I don't know to thank You for Your best love..Sorry for hurting Your heart many many times. Let me grow in You and You grow in me.

Amen Brothers and Sisters..we should give Him the first place in all things even in RELATIONSHIPS....we must be absolute on the Lord...this song really helps me a lot in preserving my church life..Amen!!!

Praise the Lord, saints. We need to give the first place in all thing to Him. This song touches my spirit so much. I realize that I will give all to Him. He is so very near, experiential. Turn to your spirit.
When I hear this song, it fills me with so much joy! Lord Jesus, I love You. Be first in my life in ALL things.

Awesome!!! I really love this song especially the the melody..it makes my heart filled with the spirit. This song, reminds me to love the Lord more with the BEST LOVE. We dont want to be preoccupied with lot of things other than HIM..Let HIM be the preeminence in everything we do..AMEN!
I give You the first place in all things by faith. Let nothing take Your place in all my heart. Infuse me with Yourself abundantly 'Til we meet, dear Lord. I'll love You with the best love.amen!!!

Praise the Lord, only He has the right to take all that I love. He must be the first in everything and my whole life. Lord Jesus, I really want to give myself to You. I need You lord, I need You. Give Yourself to me, but not give all that I want!

Lord, though i know all things will pass away, but I need more of Your mercy and grace and the preciousness of Your blood to cleanse and bring through all these temptations. Lord, for this i'm willing to give all that i have unto You, make me an overcomer everyday and pursue You constantly. (te amo mi Jesus).

Este himno es muy maravilloso, pues desde que lo escuch no pude resistir el llanto, este himno toca mi ser haciendo que este se arrepienta por cada momento que no le digo el Seor que lo amo y que l es el mejor amor para todo ser que pise la tierra. Tenemos un Seor que nos ama de una manera incondicional. Aleluya por que este es el mejor amor.
在三個月訓練中，當聽到這首歌時，同時美德弟兄說著兩位在波羅的海三小國開展而不幸遇上車禍的弟兄之見證時，那是為主的權益，被接去於榮耀中～

this song inspires me to love the Lord with my whole heart..loving Him in a way that he must be the first in everything I do..hallelujah for the Love of God that we must pay the price to love and to serve Him WITH our whole being..
I really love this song. In this song I learn how to give my best love to the Lord Jesus. Lord Jesus!! I love You with the best love.

This song I learn when I was in the upper youth training this year...really touched because I see that I must let the Lord be the first in everything! I know that my heart really contained many things...not filled by the Lord. I love the things in this world but not loving the Lord!! O Lord, plz forgive me...I love You...Lord keep my heart true to You...I love You!!!
I really love this song.... I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS!!
I really like this song because it refreshes me esp. in my work.

I like this song simply because it draws me to the Lord's presence whenever I sing this, the tune fits with its lyrics. May the Lord inspire more of His lovers to make a song and a melody for Himself. Amen.

Amen. Praise the Lord! I like this song very much. I always wanted to hear it. The tune is lovely, and much more the lyrics and its content are very rich and loveable. It is deep! Because of this new song, I pray that I would not just sing it but give my best love for Him and give Him preeminence in me for His Body.
I like this song because when I sing this song, I was being reminded by the Lord that my whole being is just to love Him.

I love this song because, every time I sing it, I'm brought into my spirit. I need to be reminded often that all my life's just to love Him with my whole being! My work, school, service, relationships...Everything should revolve around my First, Best Love! He's the reason I'm alive. "Forgetting all that I'm outwardly doing/ Forgetting all of my thoughts of improving" and just loving Him is so precious. I just need to give Him the first place, in all things by faith.
